alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 3:51PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Callahan, southeastern Jones, southwestern Shackelford and northern Taylor Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 351 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Merkel, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Wylie, Merkel, Tye, View, Hamby, Caps, Dyess Afb, Potosi, Impact, Lake Fort Phantom Hill and Kirby Lake. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 266 and 304. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
